review: I am very pleased to be able to stream with my new Fire TV stick.  The installation was the hardest part for me.  I couldn't get the remote apart to install the batteries but was able to go online and find out that a knife inserted in the seam got it to open.  Then the password became an issue.  After numerous tries I got connected and have been enjoying my choices of movies and tv shows with Amazon Prime. Since we have never had cable this is a real treat to watch "biggie size"  and frees up the computer for personal use.
author: Diane B. Carter

review: I own an Apple TV and a directv streaming device. The picture quality on those two devices is first rate. But Even when I turn off those devices, the picture quality on the Amazon stick is horrible. Nice try but this is a lousy product. I want my money back.
